GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.18.2
GSD.description:
pipe: Fix missing lock in pipe_resize_ring()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.2 by commit 71c603806614c6715165eed06099e24c2e41ad58, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit c73be61cede5882f9605a852414db559c0ebedfd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: pipe: Fix missing lock in pipe_resize_ring()
